text:
Not 100% sure if this is the best room but it doesn't look like there's a security channel...

I was hoping to be able to replicate this page on HubSpot: <https://www.google.com/.well-known/security.txt>

Issue is the slug cannot accept the "." prior to well-known. Has anyone found a way around this? It should be pretty standard to have this as a slug structure for this security based page but the platform won't allow it at all. Looking for guidance on alternatives if anyone has been down this road before
